doc.field: - Net loss 1,321,000 vs loss 1,397,000 Sales 31.1 mln vs 29.2 mln 1st half Net loss 94,000 vs loss 1,745,000 Sales 63.0 mln vs 61.9 mln NOTE: Company recently went private. Latest quarter net includes 24,000 dlr tax credit. Current half net includes gain 2,041,000 dlrs pretax from termination of pension plan.
